summary: This mod chances blessing system and blessing effects.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Description[/size]
[size=3]Everyone needs money. Including nines. I saw this and i decide for make this mod.With this mod, if you want blessing, give money and be lucky. More money is more chance so if you put 250 coin success chance is %25, if you put 500 coin success change is %50 , if you put 750 coin success change is %75 , if you put 1000 coin success change is %90.[/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Features:[/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Changed blessing effects
Changed blessing system(Money and luck)
You can gain all blessings at same time(Most important is money. If you give money everbody bless you)
Note1:This is my first mod.I hope you like my first mod.
Note2:If you want something on this mod or you find bugs please post :D
Note3:I'm foreigner, sorry for grammatical mistakes.    
Note4:This mod needs only skyrim.Not need skse etc...[/size]

[/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Effects:[/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]All blessings give 2 effects:
Talos:
1.Reduced shout recovery time by %20.
2.Resist frost by %50
Akatosh:
1.Magicka increases by 50
2.Magicka regenerates %25 faster
Mara:
1.Healing spells cure %50 more.
2.Health is increased by 20 points.
Zenithar:
1.Prices are %50 better
2.Fortify carry weignt by 50 points
Stendarr:
1.Block %25 more damage with your shield
2.One handed attacks do %50 more damage
Julianos:
1.All spells %10 more powerful
Dibella:
1.+50 speechcraft
2.Health is increases by 25 points
Arkay:
1.Health is increases by 50 points
2.Health regenerates %25 faster.
Kynareth:
1.Stamina is increases by 50 points
2.Stamina regenerates %25 faster[/size][/font]
author: insan14
